oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Confederate veteran J. D. Robinson to Miss Nancy Hayes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Love letter to the ever-popular Miss Hayes from her eventual husband, J. D. Robinso: "I have been travling close on hunderds of miles and I never saw a girl in all my Travels that I cold love besides your dear self." See Warr009, 010, and 012 for wartime letters from other admirers of Miss Hayes.
